name: Dice-Off
description:
Dice-Off is a puzzle game in which you have to carefully choose your moves to defeat the other dice. Made from scratch in 48h for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

HOW TO PLAY:

To defeat the dice you have to land on the same number as them on the same tile. If you are not careful and land on the wrong side, you lose and the level restarts. The arrows on the floor direct the evil dice in the show direction. If an evil dice manages to reach the X mark the level restarts. Enjoy!

CONTROLS:

WASD or arrow keys - move

N - next level

P - level

R - restart the current level
